decisions.what: Skip failing E2E test checkoutWithTrialBoxWithCutsSelection.spec.ts to unblock PR

decisions.what: Remove honeycomb span 'use-free-addons-by-voucher-code' due to spam
decisions.context: Span was 9th most collected with 6.3M spans/day and 100 spans per session, creating inaccurate data

decisions.what: Add ticket GOC-2963 to next sprint with appropriate priority
decisions.context: Issue triggered an incident the previous day, needs prioritization

decisions.what: Approve and roll out feature flag removal for change payment method UPM migration
decisions.context: Functionality tested successfully months ago, PR only removes flag and updates E2E tests

blockers.description: Images not loading on staging environment due to missing image paths
blockers.impact: Staging environment functionality, related to infrastructure changes being discussed in another channel

blockers.description: Trial box users unable to checkout on staging due to /order/legacy/process endpoint failure
blockers.impact: Trial box checkout flow on staging, escalated to relevant team

blockers.description: Missing menu indexes 368 and 369 for weeks 2025-W38 and 2025-W40 affecting 47 subscriptions
blockers.impact: Customer meal selections not propagated correctly, KRS alerts triggered

blockers.description: Honeycomb span spam from 'use-free-addons-by-voucher-code' operation (6.3M spans/day)
blockers.impact: Observability data accuracy and performance, PR #54999 created

blockers.description: Additional honeycomb span spam from 'operation.free-addons-operations' (thousands per session)

action_items.task: Retry meal selection for 47 affected subscriptions after menu fix
Update Service Desk notifications to remove Val and Vini tags
Clean and organize Jira board (create next sprint group, assess old groups, clean backlog)
Discuss with team whether removed honeycomb span was needed and if tracking should be reimplemented
Report back findings on VMS reactivation meal selection handling
Discuss with team possible solutions for meal selection propagation on reactivation

key_context.summary: Infrastructure updates caused temporary issues with image loading and menu display on staging, but production remained safe. Issues resolved themselves as changes propagated.
key_context.relevance: Explains root cause of multiple staging issues and establishes pattern for future infrastructure changes

key_context.summary: Missing indexes 368 and 369 in CCM for weeks W38 and W40 caused meal selection propagation failures for 47 subscriptions, triggering KRS alerts.
key_context.relevance: Data quality issue affecting customer experience that required cross-team coordination to resolve

key_context.summary: Multiple instances of span spam discovered (6.3M spans/day, 100+ per session) due to spans created inside hooks, causing inaccurate observability data.
key_context.relevance: Highlights need for better observability practices and code review standards to prevent performance and data quality issues

key_context.summary: Good Chop and TPT lack mechanism to handle meal selection propagation when customers reactivate after their previous selection window, resulting in default selections.
key_context.relevance: Identifies product gap affecting reactivated customer experience that may require new feature development

key_context.topic: Trial box checkout failure on staging
key_context.summary: The /order/legacy/process endpoint is failing for trial box users on staging environment, preventing checkout completion.
key_context.relevance: Critical staging issue that could indicate potential production problems if not addressed

summary: Good Chop squad handled multiple issues including staging environment problems from infrastructure changes, menu index configuration errors affecting 47 subscriptions, honeycomb span spam causing observability issues, and cross-brand consultation on reactivation meal selection flows.
